aboutMe: Hello, I'd like to briefly introduce myself. My passion for programming sparked at a young age. Around 14 or 15, I became fascinated with scripting, which led me to learn C# to build my foundational skills. I concluded that initial phase of my journey by publishing a script before taking a break.Currently, I am focusing on front-end development. Looking ahead, I am confident that I will also delve into back-end development, an area I am particularly passionate about.
welcomeDesc: Hi, I'm Emirkan. I'm a front-end developer. If you are looking for a Developer who can craft solid and scalable frontend products...
